EmailTemplate.name: 201710_EMEAI_Nuture_ComHelo_HAPP_JC.201710_EMEAI_Nuture_ComHelo_HAPP EMAIL4 ENG_
EmailTemplate.subject: What Support Will You Get?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customer,
What support can you expect when you select Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP)? Should the unexpected happen you can count on HAPP to ensure your rotorcraft is flight-ready and back in the air - fast!. With quick service and unparalleled 24/7 support from Honeywell’s technical product experts, there is nowhere you can fly that we don't have you covered. Your mission demands operational readiness and you are relied upon to be dependable no matter what the conditions or type of operation. Regardless if you fly for Executive/VIP Transport, Search and Rescue, Helicopter Air Ambulance, Law Enforcement, Oil and Gas or Firefighting missions, Honeywell’s global network of more than 600 authorized sales and service centers will be able to help.
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/helohapp]]>
If you don't have Honeywell avionics, please click <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/NonHONAVNX_ComHelo_HAPP.html]]> here.
